title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Learning Design Model Development Through Ubiquitous Learning Effect Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically observe phenomena occurring in ubiquitous learning environments.
Learners can derive three or more factors influencing u-learning effectiveness by applying phenomenological research methods.
Learners can produce one or more learning design models applicable to social studies based on analytical results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
